desc: Extend your baby's wardrobe, the sustainable way with Mila Malo. Our memberships give you access to Mila Malo's unique, shared baby closet to always have the right fit for your baby. Buy less baby clothes, discover more premium baby clothing brands with Mila Malo! Serving Vancouver, BC and its surrounding cities.

layout.text:
THE SHARED CLOSET,
TO ALWAYS HAVE
THE RIGHT FIT
FOR YOUR BABY
